description: Detects the creation of a schtask that executes a file from C:\Users\<USER>\AppData\Local
name: Suspicious Schtasks Execution AppData Folder
query: ((process.executable.text:*\\schtasks.exe AND process.command_line.text:*\/Create* AND process.command_line.text:*\/RU* AND process.command_line.text:*\/TR* AND process.command_line.text:*C\:\\Users\\* AND process.command_line.text:*\\AppData\\Local\\* AND process.command_line.text:(*NT\ AUT* OR *\ SYSTEM\ *)) AND (NOT (process.parent.executable.text:*\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\* AND process.parent.executable.text:*TeamViewer_.exe* AND process.executable.text:*\\schtasks.exe AND process.command_line.text:*\/TN\ TVInstallRestore*)))
author: pH-T
Nasreddine Bencherchali
